thread.title: Court decision on Vanuatu MP pardons likely to be challenged
thread.title_full: Court decision on Vanuatu MP pardons likely to be challenged - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Court decision on Vanuatu MP pardons likely to be challenged
text: Even though Vanuatu's Supreme Court has ruled against the speaker of parliament, Marcellino Pipite, for pardoning himself and 13 other MPs convicted of bribery, Tony Wilson, editor of the Vanuatu Independent newspaper, says an appeal against Justice Saksak's decision is on the way. ...
